docs.snippet: The Super Bowl did not start as the Super Bowl. The NCAA men's basketball tournament eventually came to be known as March Madness, and its semifinals as the Final Four. Now, even the most casual sports fans know exactly what they are....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Super Bowl did not start as the Super Bowl. The NCAA men's basketball tournament eventually came to be known as March Madness, and its semifinals as the Final Four. Now, even the most casual sports fans know exactly what they are.

docs.snippet: "Why he would want to do this to people ... it's really hard to understand." — Heather Abbott, of Newport, Rhode Island, who lost her left leg below the knee in the Boston Marathon attack as suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev faced prospective jurors...

docs.snippet: The 57,000-ton Hoegh Osaka was run aground on Bramble Bank, a well-marked sandbank off the port of Southampton, to prevent it from capsizing after it began to list....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 57,000-ton Hoegh Osaka was run aground on Bramble Bank, a well-marked sandbank off the port of Southampton, to prevent it from capsizing after it began to list.
docs.abstract: Hoegh Autoliners, owner of 57,000-ton car transporter Hoegh Osaka now beached on sandbank off British port of Southampton, praises crew for taking swift action to save vessel by running it aground as it began to list; fate of transporter stands in contrast to Cemfjord, bulk-cement carrier that capsized and sank in British waters.

headline.main: Decks Tilting, Crew Grounded Ship Off Southern England to Save It
headline.print_headline: Decks Tilting, Crew Grounded Ship to Save It

docs.snippet: As the Red Storm prepared to face the Wildcats in a Big East matchup, the team’s second-leading scorer, Jordan, was back after missing a weekend loss....
docs.lead_paragraph: As the Red Storm prepared to face the Wildcats in a Big East matchup, the team’s second-leading scorer, Jordan, was back after missing a weekend loss.
docs.abstract: St John's states that sophomore guard Rysheed Jordan, who was said to be on 'indefinite leave,' will return to lineup to play against Villanova; no explanation is given for his disappearance from and return to lineup.

headline.main: Rysheed Jordan Returns for St. John’s in Time to Play Villanova
headline.print_headline: A Top Player Returns for St. John’s in Time to Play Villanova
